about_the_game:
This is premium downloadable content to the "My Generators" section of Fantasy Adventure Builder. This premium DLC includes a generator for the history of magical items written by Matt Finch, and other tables not included in the Tome of Adventure Design.
Here is a list of included tables and as we keep adding tables, these updates will be free for anyone who owns this DLC.

  • Inn Generator
  • Town Generator
  • Divine Domains (59 areas for a divine portfolio, used in the magic item history generator when the item is made by a deity)
  • History of Magic Item. Generates results such as: "The magic item was created by the Sorcerer Ederoño of Croad about fifty years ago while in the employment of the Satrap of Quechne. The item is known to have been used in the battle against the creatures of Amu-Mur. It was last seen in the hands of the adventurer Graciana of Cose, who disappeared and was lost to history in the dungeons of Phnomais."
  • Female Sword & Sorcery Name 1. This is a generator that produces first names such as Janarys, Gwymirinda, and Rholiriziel.
  • Male Evil Wizard Name. This combines full-word names into a combination such as Gorom Charc, Mauldos Rune, or Adjul Yolg.

This is a list of upcoming generators that you'll get for free:

  • Male Ancient Greek Name: A table of historical male names from Ancient Greece.
  • Male Spanish Name Medieval: A table of historical male names from Medieval Spain.
  • Female Spanish Name Medieval: A table of historical female names from Medieval Spain.
  • Female Ancient Greek Name: A table of historical female names from Ancient Greece.
  • Male Welsh Name Medieval: A table of historical male names from Medieval Wales.
  • Female Welsh Name Medieval: A table of historical female names from Medieval Wales.
  • Lovecraftian Name Generator: Generated names such as Amu-Vehmassu or Mhetais
  • Place Names Short 1: Generated names such as Rhaul or Thoag
  • Place Names Short 2: Generated names such as Erct or Eokh
  • Demonic Name: Generated names such as Imjhaal or Sababrul the Constrainer
  • Dragon Name 2: Generated names such as Acralagoros or Scorvoneriax

content_descriptors.notes: This game generator may contain insinuated consumption of alcohol or tobacco and Fantasy Violence.
